Yes. Look - no doubt op was making a racist remark. My comment on the irony is simple:
1. op's text has no racial reference.
2. respondent's text makes a racial reference.
3. I can prove respondent's racial stereotyping, but at best can only infer ops comment was racial.
... That's the point I am making.

To be clear. I agree, op is a racist shit hole.
I was just being a grammar-nazi-esque douche trying point out the irony of the inference needed to understanding ops point.
